dict.acceptation: 责任；职责；责任感，责任心；负责任；

sent.orig: The foundation of criminal responsibility is the normalized responsibility which is based on moral responsibility.
sent.trans: 刑事责任的根据是以道义责任论为根基的规范责任论。

sent.orig: Arrive from external responsibility subjective responsibility, be administrative responsibility consciousness fashion a process.
sent.trans: 从客观责任到主观责任，是行政责任意识的形成过程。

sent.orig: Fruit flowers are the responsibility of the responsibility of rain clouds, the sun bright responsibility.
sent.trans: 花有果的责任，云有雨的责任，太阳有光明的责任。

sent.orig: The content of accountability includes political responsibility, legal liability, administrative responsibility and moral responsibility.
sent.trans: 被问责的主要内容包括政治责任、法律责任、行政责任、道德责任四个方面。

sent.orig: We will accept turnkey responsibility or assume whatever level of responsibility the customer requires.
sent.trans: 我们也提供交钥匙服务或根据用户要求提供各种档次的职责。
